Why You Will Love Working With Us

  • Dynamic, fast-paced, and innovation-driven work culture.
  • Clear pathways for career growth in a rapidly scaling technology company.
  • Competitive compensation.

  • Experience in Product Development for Web/Mobile technologies using modern engineering practices (CI/CD, DevOps, Automated Testing, Unit Testing, Automated Review Gates).
  • Passionate about delving into details.
  • Expertise in end-to-end project delivery using Agile Methodology, with hands-on experience in Product Grooming, Agile Ceremonies, impediment removal, and collaboration with Technical Architects, Development, Testing, Release, and Maintenance teams.
  • Strong Project Management skills including Estimation, Scheduling, Tracking, Commercials, and Quality.
  • Skilled in Stakeholder Management and Organizational Change Management.
  • Experience working with Agile teams in a Scrum Master role, anchoring ceremonies like grooming, sprint planning, sprint retro, and sprint demo. Maintain and prioritize the product backlog in alignment with Product Owners.
  • Excellent team management skills, fostering individual competency improvement and work quality.
  • Adequate technical exposure to understand modern web/mobile application development, with the ability to visualize and understand technology architecture.
  • Nice to have: Experience in the Financial domain.

Duties and Responsibilities

  1. Client Account Management:

    • Full ownership of delivery and pre-sales within a client account, balancing ongoing project delivery with identifying new opportunities.
    • Manage a team of 15-20 resources for project execution.
    • Full ownership of the project's functional, technical, and commercial quality.
    • Demonstrate a passion for understanding project details (functional & technical).
    • Strong analysis and problem-solving skills to understand client business problems and suggest solutions.
    • Act as a servant leader, building team confidence through regular interaction, professionalism, courtesy, respect, and knowledge.
    • Client Relationship Building:
      • Build customer confidence through detailed communication, proactiveness, business value addition, and quality.
      • Conduct regular status meetings with stakeholders, communicating threats, planned actions, forecasted milestone dates, and dependencies.
      • Negotiate and achieve consensus on scope changes and change requests.
      • Study client businesses to identify digital transformation opportunities and present Experion's capabilities.

  2. Scrum Master & Agile Champion:

    • Product Grooming: Collaborate with Lead BA to decide stories for grooming sessions based on the project schedule.
    • Identify technical gaps during grooming and planning, involving Architects as needed.
    • Sprint Planning: Facilitate the Dev team in task identification and estimation for groomed stories. Confirm sprint backlog based on team velocity and resource availability.
    • Daily Scrum Meetings: Conduct daily meetings, identify sprint plan challenges, and take appropriate actions.
    • Track sprint plan progress and QC Releases using Burn Down charts.
    • Sprint Reviews/Demo: Schedule and prepare for Sprint Demos, track demo comments, and ensure closure.
    • Sprint Retrospection: Promote open feedback on sprint events and track suggestions for improvement.

  3. Project Metrics Management:

    • Prepare and track project schedules based on scope, team size, and dependencies.
    • Monitor work progress and challenges, identify threats/delays, and inform stakeholders with supporting data.
    • Prepare invoice plans (considering revenue and cost) and ensure project margins are met.
    • Prepare timesheets for T&M projects and ensure timely client invoicing.
    • Ensure deliverable quality through coordination of Reviews and Testing.

  4. Communication & Pre-sales:

    • Excellent written and verbal communication skills, articulating points clearly with data support.
    • Pre-sales Skills: Collaborate with the marketing team on case studies and blogs. Coordinate project proposals with BA and Architects.

  5. Travel: Willingness to travel to client sites (overseas/domestic) for short to medium durations (1 week to 1 month).

Any Additional Information/Specifics

  • Experience in Quality Assurance and Production Support.
  • Highly effective and thrives in a dynamic environment.
  • Comfortable with proactive outward communication, leadership, and accepting challenges.
  • Adherence to ISMS policies and procedures.

Preferred Skills

  • Scrum Master
  • Project Management
  • Agile
summary: Experienced Scrum Master sought for client account management and end-to-end agile project delivery. Requires strong client interaction, team leadership, and technical understanding.

job_description:
Automation Test Engineer at Techversant Infotech (P) Ltd

Contact Email: careers@techversantinfotech.com Closing Date: 18, Nov 2025 Job Published: 09, Nov 2025

About Techversant:

Techversant is a global technology services and solutions company with over 17 years of experience, providing high-quality end-to-end IT solutions to clients worldwide. We specialize in Digital Transformation, understanding evolving industrial scenarios, investment priorities, and technology disruption. Our expertise spans multiple domains including ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, Node JS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, iOS, Android, Flutter, React Native, Angular, and React Vue, catering to various industry verticals globally.

What’s important to us:

We are seeking a skilled Automation Test Engineer with a strong background in software testing and at least 4 years of hands-on automation experience. The ideal candidate possesses strong technical skills in test automation frameworks, excellent communication abilities, and a proactive, positive attitude. Leadership qualities and the ability to work collaboratively within cross-functional teams are essential for success in this role.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and maintain robust automated test scripts and frameworks for web, mobile, and API testing.
  • Collaborate with developers, QA, and product teams to ensure high-quality releases.
  • Execute automated and manual tests to validate system functionality, performance, and reliability.
  • Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps).
  • Perform root cause analysis on failed tests and report defects with detailed logs and evidence.
  • Continuously enhance automation coverage and improve test efficiency.
  • Contribute to test strategy, planning, and estimation activities.
  • Mentor junior team members and share best practices for automation and testing processes.

Preferred Skills:

  • Minimum 5 years of experience in software testing (manual + automation).
  • Minimum 3 years of hands-on experience with popular automation tools such as: Playwright, Selenium, Cypress, Appium, TestNG, Postman, RestAssured, Robot Framework, or Katalon Studio.
  • Proficiency in at least one programming language: Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, or C#.
  • Strong understanding of QA methodologies, SDLC, STLC, and defect management processes.
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines, Git/GitHub, and Test Management tools (e.g., TestRail, Zephyr, Azure Test Plans).
  • Good exposure to API testing and automation.
  • Experience in Agile/Scrum environments.

Additional Preferred Skills:

  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Strong leadership and mentoring abilities.
  • Demonstrated proactiveness, ownership, and a positive attitude.
  • Experience in performance testing tools (e.g., JMeter, LoadRunner) is a plus.
  • Knowledge of cloud-based testing (AWS, Azure, or Docker-based environments) is desirable.

Qualification Required:

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related discipline.

What Company Offers:

  • Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies.
  • Fixed weekday day schedule with weekends off.
  • Family Medical Insurance.
  • Unique leave benefits and encashment options based on performance.
  • Long-term growth opportunities.
  • Fun family environment surrounded by experienced developers.
  • Various internal employee rewards programs based on performance.
  • Opportunities for various bonus programs (training hours, certifications, idea and innovation).
  • Work-life balance with flexible work timings, early out Fridays, and social/cultural activities.
  • Company Sponsored International Tours.

Company Address: Module No: 2306, Third Floor, Yamuna, Tower II, Technopark Phase III, SEZ Campus, Trivandrum, Kerala, 695581 Website: http://www.techversantinfotech.com
summary: Seeking an Automation Test Engineer with 3+ years of experience in automation tools and programming. Responsibilities include script development, CI/CD integration, and mentoring junior staff.
